item.title: Meta Just Paid $250M To Lure This 24-year-old AI Whiz Kid: A Strategic Move Or A Power Play?
item.description: Meta Platforms has reportedly invested a staggering $250 million to secure the talents of 24-year-old AI prodigy, Matt Deitke. read more

item.title: US Ends De Minimis Tariff Loophole for All Imports, Disrupting Global E-Commerce
item.description: The U.S. will end duty-free treatment for low-value imports globally, shaking up cross-border e-commerce and targeting trade loopholes. read more

item.title: Berkshire Buyback Pause Signals Caution Despite $344 Billion Cash Hoard, Rail Gains
item.description: Berkshire paused buybacks in Q2 despite a $344B cash pile, as mixed segment results and market caution signaled Buffett's wait-and-watch approach. rea...

item.title: Elon Musk Warns of Losing Tesla Control, Denies Personal Loans Tied To Shares
item.description: Elon Musk has expressed concerns over potentially losing control of Tesla due to the influence of activist shareholders. read more

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway Faces $3.8 Billion Loss Tied to Kraft Heinz Stake
